member.name: M:StudentManagement.API.Controllers.AuthController.Login(StudentManagement.Models.LoginDto)
member.summary: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token.
member.param: The login details including username and password.
member.returns: A JWT token if authentication is successful; otherwise, Unauthorized.

member.name: M:StudentManagement.Controllers.CourseController.AssignStudentToCourses(StudentManagement.Models.AssignCourseDto)
member.summary: Assigns a list of courses to a student.
member.param: The assignment details, including the student ID and list of course IDs.
member.returns: A message indicating success or failure.

member.name: M:StudentManagement.Controllers.StudentController.AddStudent(StudentManagement.Entities.Student)
member.summary: Adds a new student to the system.
member.returns: A message indicating success or failure.

member.name: M:StudentManagement.Controllers.StudentController.GetStudents
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all students, including their enrolled courses.
member.returns: A list of students with enrolled courses.
